name: Pizza Boy (SamKullberg)
description:
Title: Pizza Boy

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Age 6+, casual gamers

Game overview: This platformer game gives players the opportunity to explore a LEGO World with many dangers and rewards. Watch out for shooting enemies and the pizza boy, who seems to always be running around! However, the many LEGO items and mechanics provide fun for everyone.

Instructions: Use W to move forward, D to move to the left, S to move backwards, A to move to the left, space bar to jump, and the mouse to change your view. The goal is to both touch the brick on the altar of the top of the world and collect the 13 prizes. 

Sam Kullberg-Game Designer
